name: Dice Factory (blakemr)
description:
Welcome to the Dice Factory!

Choose the faces of your die, then roll it to accumulate points!

How to play:

The deal button fills your hand with face cards from your deck. You only have 20 cards, so make them count!

 

Roll the current die you have made.  Faces set in the die are consumed.

Drag dice faces from your hand onto the die template.

There are 3 kinds of dice:

  • Numbers: Rolling a number will add that many points to your score
  • x2: Rolling this will double your score
  • +dice: Rolling this face will add five more dice faces to your deck

The game is over when you have used all of your dice faces. Good Luck!
